title: 6145crontab
zzzContent:
6145crontab ;

#20 01 * * * /home/admin/php/bin/php /home/admin/leapfrog_dashboard/index.php 2>&1
10 00 * * * /home/admin/php/bin/php /home/admin/leapfrog_dashboard/fatal_error.php 2>&1
#*/10 * * * * sh /home/admin/monitor/new.sh >>/home/admin/monitor/new.log.`date +\%w`  2>&1
#*/10 * * * * sh /home/admin/monitor/check_same_version.sh >>/home/admin/tmp/check_same_version.log  2>&1
20 */1 * * * /bin/bash /home/admin/script/monitor/pvlog.sh >&/dev/null
10 08 * * * /bin/bash /home/admin/script/email/query/run_query.sh >&/dev/null
#黄滚注:谁也不要动serverlists,谁动出了故障算谁的....

#生成场景导购的机器列表并推送到v009028.cm8
